name: Binary Tree Paths
desc:
Given a binary tree, return all root-to-leaf paths.

Note:Â A leaf is a node with no children.

Example:


Input:

   1
 /   \
2     3
 \
  5

Output: ["1->2->5", "1->3"]

Explanation: All root-to-leaf paths are: 1->2->5, 1->3
